name: Pulse Jumper (itch)
description:
If you enjoyed the demo, please join our Discord Server!

Pulse Jumper is a singleplayer precision-platformer where the only way to jump is with a gun!

Features:
  • Difficult but fun levels to traverse and play.
  • A speedrunning timer to see how fast you can beat the game!
  • You can only jump by shooting at the ground.
  • An absolute banger soundtrack
Credits:
  • Benathen - Programmer and Lead Dev
  • TimeTomb - Artist
  • Milkman - Musician and Level Designer
  • Blyat - Concept Artist
